title: Cadence Chat Export
details: This feature was designed to allow users of Cadence, a chat management tool to setup both manual and automated exports of chat leads and activity reports. The UI was built in React and connected to an API to toggle nightly automated exports on and off. In addition, a manaul export feature allowed the user to request an export which was emailed to them immediately.

title: Harris Print Solutions Web Site
details: Harris Print Solutions, a division of Harris Computer needed a completely new design for their web site. I was tasked with designing and developing an entirely new web site with new layouts, forms and embedded multimedia files.
imgAlt: screenshot of Harris Print Solutions page

title: Mobile App Design
details: gathR was a mobile app concept that revolved around social connections. The product owner need a logo/brand identity and mobile app designs. I started with developing mood boards and concepts, finally delivering design guides to aid the mobile app developer.

title: Logo Design | Mood Board | Interactive Prototype
description: Logo/brand identity and progressive app prototype
details: Mood board, logo design and interactive prototype written in Ionic Framework/Angular JS

title: UX Design | Wireframe | Prototype | CSS | HTML | JavaScript | Angular
description: Logo/brand identity and progressive app prototype
details: Harris Local Government wanted a new landing page for the flagship product: MyGovHub - a customer portal for citizens to pay their taxes, utility bills and more. Written in Angular JS
